DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess in general population NSAID and gastroprotective agent utilization and compliance in elderly people.
DOC.brief_title: Gastroprotective Agent Utilization and Compliance in Elderly Patients Taking Non-steroidal Anti-inflammatory Drug (NSAID) in France
DOC.criteria: French people > 65 years old, part of Kantar Health Access Sant√© panel
